channel.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
channel.description:
[quote]
[color=A4A4A4]<big>**Angel**</big>[/color]
[color=A4A4A4]**Neutral Special**[/color] :rescue_worker_helmet: :star:
**Angel Bless (Passive)** - Immune to death once. This passive is lost after you have achived your win condition.
**Angel Wings (Day)** - Guarantee to visit your target tonight. [2 Use]
**Blessing (Night)** - Protect a player for tonight. Will not protect death from Bleed or Execute. [Infinite Use] [color=3ADF00]**You have successfully Blessed [Target].**[/color] [color=3ADF00]**You have been attacked but you have been Blessed.**[/color] [color=DBA901]**[Target] did not get attacked.**[/color] [color=DBA901]**You attacked [Target] but Angel Bless stopped the attack.**[/color]
**Goddess Light (Night)** - Prevent every attack tonight. If the attack is non-unlimited, then the attacker will regain the use. Annoucement will be made at the end of the night. You will get 1 success protected. Wont stop **[color=2E64FE]Prince[/color]** from executing his prisoner. [1 Use] [color=DBA901]**Angel have release the Goddess Light and stopped any attacks for the night.**[/color] [color=DBA901]**You attempt to attack [Target] but the Goddess Light have prevent you from it.**[/color]
**Win condition:** *Successfully protected 3 people from dying.* [/quote]

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
That would just go as old Merc.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
This would be a good friendly neutral to have in the game, however you already broke the rules for what defines a good neutral.

You can only have 1-2 of these and not 3 for it to be a good neutral
Unconvertible
Confirmable
Helpful to BD

You need to get rid of the confirmability in this class and you need to get rid of the second night Ability. It takes almost zero skill to use, I would suggest making the second night Ability being able to guard 3 people that night.

“ You have been attacked but you have been Blessed” it should instead be you were attacked but you were healed. It reduces confirmability of a useful neutral class. Better yet is giving no feedback but I’ll doubt they will add this into the game if it has no feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
How about this? Instead of having to protect 3 people, he has one target that he has to keep alive to the end of the game to win. Although if you did that you might want to change up the abilities and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
Then i will rewind the chance and made it need 3 successful protected

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Ah. That makes sense now.

Read full topic

item.description:
Occupation, Redirection, Jailiation, Tornadoiation, etc…

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Then the ability is useless for the neutral itself to use…? It’s similar to a survivor gaining an investigative ability for instance. It’s not an ability supporting the class in attaining its goal.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
SweetyCake:

Goddess Light (Night) - Prevent every attack tonight. If the attack is non-unlimited, then the attacker will regain the use. Annoucement will be made at the end of the night. You wont get any success protected. Wont stop Prince from executing his prisoner. [1 Use]

How about this then?

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Way too easy. This is basically a support that needs to protect successfully once and loses one chance at that with Goddess Light.

Read full topic

item.description:
I use heal as the general word for protecting
Chronomancer doesn’t get results and he doesn’t heal, only delay

item.description:
This is not Heal, you are taking it wrong
Also this is made so everyone could know Angel is in th game

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
SweetyCake:

You have successfully Blessed [Target].
You have been attacked but you have been Blessed.
[Target] did not get attacked.
You attacked [Target] but Angel Bless stopped the attack.

Heals generally do not give feedback, regardless of whether or not the target was attacked

item.title: Class Suggestion - Angel [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
Angel

Neutral Special

Angel Bless (Passive) - Immune to death once. This passive is lost after you have achived your win condition.

Angel Wings (Day) - Guarantee to visit your target tonight. [2 Use]

Blessing (Night) - Protect a player for tonight. Will not protect death from Bleed or Execute. [Infinite Use]

You have been attacked but you have been Blessed.
[Target] did not get attacked.
You attacked [Target] but Angel Bless stopped the attack.

Goddess Light (Night) - Prevent every attack tonight. If the attack is non-unlimited, then the attacker will regain the use. Annoucement will be made at the end of the night. You will get 1 success protected. Wont stop Prince from executing his prisoner. [1 Use]
Angel have release the Goddess Light and stopped any attacks for the night.
You attempt to attack [Target] but the Goddess Light have prevent you from it.
